sqlMap.select:
select id, customer_degree_id, customer_name, customer_code, customer_short_name, contact_person_first, phone_first, fax_first, contact_person_sec, phone_sec, fax_sec, own_contact_person, degree_code, contract_address, postcode, com_adress, bank, account_number, tax_code, home_page, email, memo, reputation_money, reputation_period,lock_status,reputation_type,own_contact_person_id,closing_account_mode from t_customers_infor t
t.customer_code like '%$customerCode$%'
t.customer_name like '%$customerName$%'
t.degree_code like '%$degreeCode$%'
t.own_contact_person like '%$ownContactPerson$%'
t.contact_person_first like '%$contactPersonFirst$%'
t.contact_person_sec like '%$contactPersonFirst$%'
order by $sort$ $dir$
limit #start#, #limit#

SELECT cus.customer_code,cus.customer_name FROM t_customers_infor cus INNER JOIN ( SELECT customer_code FROM t_contract_infor WHERE STATUS = 5 GROUP BY customer_code ) con ON cus.customer_code = con.customer_code
HAVING cus.customer_name like '%$customerName$%'
order by $sort$ $dir$
limit #start#, #limit#

select id, customer_degree_id, customer_name, customer_code, customer_short_name, contact_person_first, phone_first, fax_first, contact_person_sec, phone_sec, fax_sec, own_contact_person, degree_code, contract_address, postcode, com_adress, bank, account_number, tax_code, home_page, email, memo, reputation_money, reputation_period,lock_status,reputation_type,own_contact_person_id,closing_account_mode from t_customers_infor t
t.customer_name like '%$customerName$%'

select count(*) from t_customers_infor t
t.customer_code like '%$customerCode$%'
t.customer_name like '%$customerName$%'
t.degree_code like '%$degreeCode$%'
t.own_contact_person like '%$ownContactPerson$%'
select t.* from t_customers_infor t where t.customer_code=#value#

select id, customer_degree_id, customer_name, customer_code, customer_short_name, contact_person_first, phone_first, fax_first, contact_person_sec, phone_sec, fax_sec, own_contact_person, degree_code, contract_address, postcode, com_adress, bank, account_number, tax_code, home_page, email, memo, reputation_money, reputation_period, lock_status, reputation_type, own_contact_person_id, closing_account_mode from t_customers_infor
order by $orderByClause$

select id, customer_degree_id, customer_name, customer_code, customer_short_name, contact_person_first, phone_first, fax_first, contact_person_sec, phone_sec, fax_sec, own_contact_person, degree_code, contract_address, postcode, com_adress, bank, account_number, tax_code, home_page, email, memo, reputation_money, reputation_period, lock_status, reputation_type, own_contact_person_id, closing_account_mode from t_customers_infor where id = #id:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_customers_infor (id, customer_degree_id, customer_name, customer_code, customer_short_name, contact_person_first, phone_first, fax_first, contact_person_sec, phone_sec, fax_sec, own_contact_person, degree_code, contract_address, postcode, com_adress, bank, account_number, tax_code, home_page, email, memo, reputation_money, reputation_period, lock_status, reputation_type, own_contact_person_id, closing_account_mode) values (#id:VARCHAR#, #customerDegreeId:VARCHAR#, #customerName:VARCHAR#, #customerCode:VARCHAR#, #customerShortName:VARCHAR#, #contactPersonFirst:VARCHAR#, #phoneFirst:VARCHAR#, #faxFirst:VARCHAR#, #contactPersonSec:VARCHAR#, #phoneSec:VARCHAR#, #faxSec:VARCHAR#, #ownContactPerson:VARCHAR#, #degreeCode:VARCHAR#, #contractAddress:VARCHAR#, #postcode:VARCHAR#, #comAdress:VARCHAR#, #bank:VARCHAR#, #accountNumber:VARCHAR#, #taxCode:VARCHAR#, #homePage:VARCHAR#, #email:VARCHAR#, #memo:VARCHAR#, #reputationMoney:DECIMAL#, #reputationPeriod:INTEGER#, #lockStatus:INTEGER#, #reputationType:INTEGER#, #ownContactPersonId:VARCHAR#, #closingAccountMode:VARCHAR#)

values

id = #record.id:VARCHAR#
customer_degree_id = #record.customerDegreeId:VARCHAR#
customer_name = #record.customerName:VARCHAR#
customer_code = #record.customerCode:VARCHAR#
customer_short_name = #record.customerShortName:VARCHAR#
contact_person_first = #record.contactPersonFirst:VARCHAR#

customer_degree_id = #customerDegreeId:VARCHAR#
customer_name = #customerName:VARCHAR#

phone_sec = #phoneSec:VARCHAR#
fax_sec = #faxSec:VARCHAR#

degree_code = #degreeCode:VARCHAR#

postcode = #postcode:VARCHAR#
